publishConfirm: Are you sure you want to publish the code of conduct? Attendees will have to confirm acceptance of the new code of conduct.
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the code of conduct? Any assisgned attendees will now see the default code of conduct
trustedPersonsDes: Trusted Persons are people that are able to listen and handle reported incidents. They should have training in this area and an image attached to their attendee profile to help attendees find them easily.
enterCode: Enter code of conduct text here or
disclaimer: DoubleDutch hereby disclaims any and all liability in connection with this Code of Conduct.
fail: *Please check that your file was formatted correctly and use the template for guidance
failError: *This file cannot successfully be imported. Please check that emails are valid and its a CSV
dupError: *This file cannot successfully be imported due to emails associated with another Code of Conduct. Please edit your list before continuing
importListHelp: This feature allows new code of conducts templates to be assigned to specific individuals. Simply upload a list of email addresses associated with a users DoubleDutch account and you are ready to go!
titleHelp: *Please ensure you have a Default Code of Conduct titled 'Default'
noCodeHelp: No Custom Code of Conducts have been added
